comment: She is an amazing professor! She really wants you to succeed. The homework is relevant to the class and she is very accessible for online students. 100% would take again!

Best teacher I have ever had. She is super generous and caring. She genuinely wants students to succeed. I am furious that I could not take a class with her next semester. Absolutely please choose her as a teacher.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: If you want to start learning French this is the best professor to start with. She is the most amazing Prof. I have ever had. She does have you purchase an online textbook/site but its amazing and you absolutely need it for the class as most the homework is done on this online textbook website.
She is one of the best professors I have ever had! She will inspire you to further pursue learning French if you aren't already doing so.

I absolutely love Dr. Alexander. I took her for French 1001/1002 and she is an amazing, caring teacher. She is more than willing to accommodate students if they have problems and she really does care about her students. I don't completely remember because it took it last semester but I believe there's only VHL, quizzes, and proctored tests.
She is one of the sweetest teachers I have ever had. She genuinely cares for her students and wants to help them improve. Definitely take her if you can.
TAKE HER! Wow she is just a 10/10 woman and I feel blessed that I got her.

I loved Dr. Alexander's class! She is very passionate about French and does everything she can to make sure her students succeed. Her tests are a bit challenging because they consist of listening to, reading, and writing French. You will speak French, but she is very forgiving if it's not perfect and gives very kind feedback. Would recommend her!

I LOVED Dr. Alexander. You can just feel her enthusiasm - it permeates the room and really makes you feel welcome and enthusiastic. She's silly, fun, and a great teacher. She's always able to help you with any problems you have. Don't forget to do your online homework - it's really helpful! There's lots of hand-on practice - I highly recommend Dr.A

I literally cannot recommend Dr. Alexander enough. You speak a lot during class, but she welcomes mistakes. You won't feel embarrassed or ashamed if you make any. The class consists of tests, quizzes, VHL homework, compositions, and an oral exam. Overall, if you put in the effort you will make a good grade no matter what.

LOVE HER! Best prof I have EVER taken! Cares in and out of class and wants to help with your future! VERY clear grading, lots of extra credit, and SO SWEET!!! I don't think it is possible to give her anything less than a 5! You do need to study for quizzes + tests to get a good grade but you can revise for more credit. I would 100% take her again

One of the best professors I've ever had. She truly wants you to learn the language and will do everything to make sure you succeed. Is extremely kind and never leaves a student behind. Very knowledgeable about course content. No matter your French level, I highly recommend.

Not only is she one of the best professors I've had, she's probably one of the nicest people I've ever met. She truly has a passion for teaching and genuinely wants you to succeed. Very knowledgeable and you learn a lot of new things every class. Not too easy, but not harder than any other language course. I can't say enough good things about her!
